title: SimpleTaskManager
name: Name:
test-instance-notice: This is a test instance of the SimpleTaskManager.
footer: Version: {{version}}Code: GitHubLicense: GPLv3Icons: Linearicons
you-have-been-removed: You have been removed from project '{{projectName}}'
feature-upload-error: No polygons exist or data has unknown format. Supported formats are: GeoJson, OSM-XML, GPX, KML, EsriJson and WKT.
login-failed: Logout because authorization was not successful

login.welcome-subtitle: The free and easy to use tasking manager for collaborative work on OpenStreetMap. Learn more about STM in the OSM-Wiki.

project.title: Project:
project.could-not-add-task-comment: Could not add comment to task '{{taskName}}'

project-list.no-project-notice: You currently don't have any projects.

project-settings.could-not-update-project: Unable to update project title and/or description

project-creation.title: Import from external sources
project-creation.description: Tasks are created from polygons. These geometries can be imported from different external sources.
project-creation.copy-notice: Copy and import an existing project you are a member of.
project-creation.import-notice: Import an existing project from your computer. Existing inputs in the "Properties" tab will be overwritten.
project-creation.subdivide-notice: This divides the selected task into smaller tasks of the selected shape and size.
project-creation.subdivide-result-too-large-notice: Result with {{amountTasksAfterDividing}} tasks is too large, only {{maxTasksPerProject}} tasks allowed.
project-creation.subdivide-result-way-too-large-notice: Result would be way too large, only {{maxTasksPerProject}} tasks allowed.
project-creation.subdivide-result-notice: You will have {{amountTasksAfterDividing}} tasks in total.
project-creation.url-file-format-notice: URL to GeoJSON, OSM-XML, GPX, EsriJson, KML or WKT data:
project-creation.load-li-3: Copy the link after "raw data directly from" (right click and "copy link")
project-creation.upload-notice: Upload a GeoJSON, OSM-XML, GPX, EsriJson, KML or WKT file, which contains polygons. Each polygon will result in a single task.
project-creation.remote-url-error: Unable to load data from remote URL
project-creation.no-task-yet-notice: There are no tasks here yet. Use the pencil-tool to draw tasks or import tasks via the "Upload" or "Remote" tab.

task-details.title: Task
task-details.unable-load-josm: Unable to open JOSM. Is it running?

user.already-member: User {{user}} is already a member of this project
user.unable-load-user: Could not load user ID for user {{user}}. The user must have at least one changeset or note.
